<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 2"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Marshal Dedication](/Feats.aspx?ID=6351) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Archetype" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=535" />
<trait label="Dedication" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=572" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Player Core 2](/Sources.aspx?ID=227) pg. 204 <sup>1.1</sup>

**Archetype** [Marshal](/Archetypes.aspx?ID=254)

**Prerequisites**
Trained in [Diplomacy](/Skills.aspx?ID=39) or Trained in [Intimidation](/Skills.aspx?ID=40); trained in martial weapons

</column>

---

You’ve combined your social skills and combat training to become a talented combat leader. Choose [Diplomacy](/Skills.aspx?ID=39) or [Intimidation](/Skills.aspx?ID=40). You become trained in that skill or become an expert if you were already trained in it.

In addition, while you’re conscious, you’re surrounded by a marshal’s aura in a 15-foot emanation. Your aura has the [emotion](/Traits.aspx?ID=590), [mental](/Traits.aspx?ID=647), and [visual](/Traits.aspx?ID=727) traits and grants you and allies in the aura a +1 status bonus to saving throws against [fear](/Traits.aspx?ID=598).

<title level="2">Marshal Dedication leads to...</title>
[Back to Back](/Feats.aspx?ID=6358), [Cadence Call](/Feats.aspx?ID=6356), [Coordinated Charge](/Feats.aspx?ID=6361), [Dread Marshal Stance](/Feats.aspx?ID=6352), [Form Up!](/Feats.aspx?ID=7018), [General's Gambit](/Feats.aspx?ID=7019), [Inspiring Marshal Stance](/Feats.aspx?ID=6353), [Know Your Enemy](/Feats.aspx?ID=7017), [Rallying Charge](/Feats.aspx?ID=6357), [Snap Out of It!](/Feats.aspx?ID=6354), [Steel Yourself!](/Feats.aspx?ID=6355), [Strategist Stance](/Feats.aspx?ID=7016), [Tactical Cadence](/Feats.aspx?ID=6362), [Target of Opportunity](/Feats.aspx?ID=6363), [To Battle!](/Feats.aspx?ID=6359), [Topple Foe](/Feats.aspx?ID=6360)
